channel.title: Last help topic from me i promise!
channel.description:
Lmao, Hey guys, 3rd one today but I am redoing my source so I kinda need help with some things.
I need to know the following seeing how the tuts were deleted last night with that tut cleanout.
How do I add the ::suggest Command How do I add the item turning you into a object thing. It was in the tut as a Mith Med that made you into a crate. But I changed it to a different Item. So does anyone know those? POST PL0X!

item.title: Last help topic from me i promise!
item.dc:creator: @krisdude krisdude
item.description:
@krisdude wrote:

Lol, obviously it starts with that.
But it saves stuff people type after ::suggest in a .txt file

Read full topic
item.source: Last help topic from me i promise!

item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

Hmm never seen a suggest command before maybe…

else (commandStarts.with (“suggest”)
sendMessage

Something on those lines.

Read full topic
